snippet: The conviction, stemming from a January attack on French soldiers on a shared base, was the first for a “green-on-blue” attack by Afghans on the American-led coalition.
abstract: Afghan military court convicts and sentences to death an Afghan soldier who gunned down four French soldiers in January; it is the first conviction for what is known as a green-on-blue attack against the American-led coalition.

byline.contributor: An Afghan employee of The New York Times contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The conviction, stemming from a January attack on French soldiers on a shared base, was the first for a “green-on-blue” attack by Afghans on the American-led coalition.

headline.seo: Court Convicts Afghan Soldier in Attack on Allies
headline.main: Court Convicts Afghan Soldier in Attack on Allies
headline.print_headline: Court Finds Afghan Guilty Of Attacking Allied Troops
